1604066577_mirrored_antowan_github.body:
Hello,

I've got the same error this morning with a fresh install of ZeroBundle linux 64bits.

`Err: IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'src/Ui/template/wrapper.html' in UiServer.py line 95 > UiRequest.py line 130 > MutePlugin.py line 138 > UiRequest.py line 299 > UiRequest.py line 394 > UiRequest.py line 249`

I checked the terminal for an error after launching ZeroNet.sh and I found the following line :

`Ui.UiServer Web interface bind error, must be running already, exiting.... [Errno 98] Address already in use: ('127.0.0.1', 43110)`

I checked the running processes using ps and find that start.py was still running :

```
xyz   14708  0.0  0.0  14448  3196 ?        S    10:25   0:00 /bin/bash ../Python/python start.py
xyz   14710  0.3  0.1 684964 56160 ?        Sl   10:25   0:36 ../Python/python2.7 start.py
```

So I killed the first process and launched ZeroNet.sh again, without any error this time.

I hope this could help.
